guidelines.description: This guideline is updated from 2010 version.  In 2013 changes were made in section 2.4 (pages 7-8), and levels of evidence converted to GRADE system.  A further addendum was made in 2014 to section 7.1.2 (page 22) and section 9.4 (pages 35-36).  References for these sections have been updated to 2014.
guidelines.title: Multiple myeloma

guidelines.description: This guideline is an updated version of the 2011 guideline.

guidelines.description: This addendum is in relation to patients receiving T-cell depleting agents such as alemtuzumab for non-haematological indications including solid organ transplantation, multiple sclerosis and vasculitis.

guidelines.description: The BCSH pdf version is more extensive than the published version.

guidelines.description: This is an addendum to THE 2009 guidelines on the management of aplastic anaemia.

guidelines.description: Please note changes to previous version: Appendix 5 and 9 have minor additions referencing testing to the URS.  Appendix 8 has a change in wording to PQ.  Appendix 10 has an extra column in the table to reference the test script to the URS/FDS.  Please see also the full guideline.
guidelines.title: Validation and qualification

guidelines.description: An update of the 2008 BCSH guideline incorporating the 2008 WHO guidelines as they apply to lymphoproliferative disorder.
